job.title: Business Systems Analyst - Fixed Term
job.description:
Salary Package: $122,946 per annum plus super - Housing negotiable


Join the City of Karratha as a Business Systems Analyst and play a key role in a transformative, city-wide IT project. As part of a major business transformation initiative, the City is implementing a new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system using TechnologyOne Ci Anywhere. This exciting opportunity will see you at the forefront of system implementation across multiple departments, working closely with ERP vendors, the project steering board, and internal teams.

About the role:

  • Develop and document business requirements and designs based on business needs.
  • Review, interpret and provide advice on business requirements into processes and/or solutions for operational and project requirements.
  • Assist with project governance including weekly tracking and reporting of project progress across assigned software modules through proficiency in the management and use of contemporary project management tools.
  • Provide thought leadership and business benefit vision in shaping the new Enterprise systems to the requirements of the City.
  • Prepare project documentation and where appropriate recommendations to facilitate the decision-making process of key stakeholders.

About You:

  • Relevant tertiary qualifications in one of IT/IS, Business Analysis, Project Management (desirable)
  • Demonstrated Experience with TechnologyOne CiAnywhere or similar software module roll out.
  • Demonstrated experience in Organisational Change Management including new systems implementation and training.
  • Familiarity with project management methodologies (waterfall and agile)
  • Demonstrated experience in gathering and analysing business requirements for IT system changes in collaboration with key stakeholders.
  • Experience working within Local Government parameters desirable
  • Current C class driver’s licence National (or Federal) Police Certificate (no more than 6 months old)

Ready to Join Us? If you’re ready to bring your expertise and enthusiasm to help shape the future of our ERP Team, we’d love to hear from you!

Disclaimer: Please refer to the official City of Karratha website for the most accurate and up-to-date job advertisement.

job.title: <![CDATA[Business Systems Analyst - Fixed Term]]>
job.description:
p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; } hr { height: 1px; border-width: 0; } li.unchecked::marker { content: "\2610"; } li.checked::marker { content: "\2612"; }

The City of Karratha is offering an opportunity for an experienced and suitably qualified Accountant to join our Financial Services Team.

This position is based in Karratha, offering an attractive salary and a range of other benefits including, but not limited to:

  • Allowances
  • Six weeks’ annual leave
  • 13% Superannuation

As a member of the financial services team the Assistant Management Accountant is responsible for assisting with the Annual Budget, Budget Reviews, and Long term financial plans as required.

The role also supports the Management Accountant in preparing the Council’s annual budget and budget reviews, responds to audit enquiries, and oversees the accounts receivable, invoicing, and debt recovery processes.

Qualifications and experience required for the role:

  • A relevant tertiary qualification in finance/ accounting
  • A minimum of 2 years’ experience in a similar position within a medium to large organisation
  • A current C Class drivers licence
  • A National (or Federal) Police Certificate (no more than 6 months old)

Why Join Us?

  • Competitive salary and benefits.
  • A supportive and inclusive work environment.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • Play an important role in the City’s financial future.
